channel.title: WhereIsMyTransport on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in WhereIsMyTransport on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Unlocking Mobility: TapTap Maps in Cap-Ha√Øtien
item.description: Challenge Haitian cities suffer from poor transportation services, and the lack of data from existing services limits improvement efforts. Tap Taps are the most popular motorized transportation mode employed across Haiti, yet there is not enough data on them as they are informal, private, and marginally regulated.

item.title: Mapping Freetown Transit for Resiliency
item.description: Challenge: The resiliency of a transport network is a critical component to the stability and prosperity of a city. Freetown, prone to flooding and landslides, struggles to maintain services throughout the year.
